hero.title: Awards & Recognitions
hero.intro: Year after year, Shivalik College earns national honors for academic outcomes, student support, and industry alignment, validating the ambition behind every program.

awards.title: Recognition by NCC Directorate
awards.subtitle: Appreciation for institutional NCC leadership
awards.description: The NCC Directorate honored Shivalik College in 2020 for cultivating disciplined cadets and enabling high-impact social outreach.

awards.title: Best Engineering Institute for Academic Excellence
awards.subtitle: Academic Excellence Award
awards.description: Recognized for consistently superior pedagogy, modern labs, and outcomes that raise the benchmark for engineering education in North India.

awards.title: Outlook India Engineering Rankings
awards.subtitle: Top 3 in Uttarakhand (2019)
awards.description: Ranked #3 in Uttarakhand among India's top 150 engineering colleges for academic excellence by Outlook in 2019.

awards.title: Times Engineering Survey 2021
awards.subtitle: North India & National Ranks
awards.description: Secured #3 in Uttarakhand, #16 in North India, and #85 across India among the top 175 engineering institutes as per the 2021 Times survey.

awards.title: Best Promising Pharmacy College
awards.subtitle: 4th Himalayan Educators Summit
awards.description: Honored as the best promising pharmacy college of 2021 for its research-driven curriculum and industry-ready training pathways.

awards.title: THE Week - Hansa Research Survey
awards.subtitle: Top Private Engineering College
awards.description: Ranked #2 in Uttarakhand among private engineering colleges across India by THE Week and Hansa Research Survey 2020.

awards.title: Times Engineering Survey 2020
awards.subtitle: Top Placements Recognition
awards.description: Ranked #1 in Uttarakhand among the top 50 private engineering institutes for placements, highlighting strong recruiter trust.

awards.title: Best Industry Interface Award
awards.subtitle: Divya Himgiri & UTU
awards.description: Received the 2019 Education Excellence Award for building robust industry partnerships that feed internships, research, and careers.

awards.title: CMAI, AICTE & UTU Honors
awards.subtitle: Best Engineering College for Academic Excellence
awards.description: CMAI, AICTE, and UTU jointly recognized Shivalik as the best engineering college for academic excellence, underscoring a decade of innovation.

metadata.title: Awards & Recognitions | Shivalik College
metadata.description: Explore the national rankings, surveys, and honors that affirm Shivalik College's leadership in engineering and pharmacy education.
